document_data.name: Mor Kulenov
document_data.mainbody: '''Mor Kulenov''' was a [[wizard]] working for King [[Gareth Dragonsbane]] of [[Damara]].{{cite book/The Rite||Prologue}}
document_data.Description: Master Kulenov was a pudgy, little man with a billy-goat beard.
document_data.Abilities: While in the [[Plane of Shadow]], Mor Kulenov cast ''[[Nybor's wrathful castigation]]'' on a [[shadow dragon]], and with a different spell, he made his staff and beard shimmer; the latter shimmered longer, suggesting he was casting ''[[silverbeard]]''.{{cite book/The Rite||12}}
document_data.History: Master Kulenov was the one who allowed [[Sergor Marsk]] and his traitors into the King's retinue on [[Mirtul 3]] in the {{YearlinkName|1373}}. He was present there too, and attempted to rouse the King after he was cursed, but failed. He was later part of the incursion into the Plane of Shadow to recover the King's soul on [[Kythorn 26]].
